name: Blob's Adventure
description:
• A story-driven game through the eyes of Blob, a happy-go-lucky green slime
  • There is a hub world with three main levels to choose from.
  • After completing a level the hub world changes and a building piece is added to the hub area.
  • Movement system that gives the player new ways to interact with the world as well as changing how the player behaves.
  • Funny voice acting from our group members.

Blob’s Adventure is a goofy, light-hearted platformer that sees you playing as a hopeless romantic glop. After gazing at the clouds one day, Blob found himself mesmerized by a large, beautiful slime-shaped figure in the clouds. Now he is determined to build his way up to reach her. Overcome challenges to help Blob retrieve the building materials he will need by navigating through three levels set in his world!
